variant.question: Which of the following options correctly lists errors that affect the accuracy and reliability of the Satellite-Assisted Navigation system (GNSS/GPS)?

options.text: Satellite mutual interference, frequency drift, and satellite to ground time lag.
Satellite clock, satellite ephemeris, and ionospheric propagation.
Satellite to ground time lag, atmospheric propagation, and satellite clock.
Satellite mutual interference, satellite ephemeris, and atmospheric propagation.

variant.question: Which statement about dilution of precision is correct? The value of the dilution of precision depends upon the..

options.text: geometry and the number of satellites in view.
accuracy with which the range between the satellite and receiver can be measured.
availability of receiver autonomous integrity monitoring software.
